segments.text: May I have a look at that vase , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . It's the best one I have here---and it's only 300 yuan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , it's really nice , but to tell the truth , that's far too expensive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Even for such an excellent one ?
segments.speaker: S2
